review_data.title: Great value on the go!
review_data.content: Fast, convenient, cheap. As you probably already know, it's very difficult to find a cheap bite in this city but Schnägg makes that possible. For 5 CHF you can get a quick grab and go bite that's also delicious and doesn't feel as guilty as...More

review_data.title: A quick, healthy and cheap TO GO option
review_data.content: Schnagg is a small chain of no-frills, healthy food Take Away places popping up around the city. I visited the one at the Main Train Station (near Track #18). There was a friendly young lady working inside this small shop that probably couldn’t hold more...More

review_data.title: Eat healthy
review_data.content: Fast and good service. The have very good soups, salads and Sandwiches. The only bad thing is that they don't have much variety and the salads are in a opaque boxes, so don't know what you are buying

review_data.title: Filiale Zürich Enge
review_data.content: Kartoffelsuppe war voller chemischer Zusätze und schmeckte auch so. Kürbissuppe hatte einen Ölfilm, war wässrig und schmeckte chemisch. Linsensalat warm,...More

review_data.title: a Rapid and not expansive Lunch
review_data.content: I go to this Take away min. 2 times per Week and for me it's the perfect combination between a fast service, and some fresh Products every days. An interesting choose of salads and sandwiches with permanently actions to discover some new products.

review_data.title: Sandwich, Suppe, Salat - Take Away
review_data.content: Der neue Standort am HB Zürich ist sehr gut gelegen (Gleis 18), klein, aber superfrisch. Der Linsensalat ist sehr lecker...More

review_data.title: Finally, a great "Grab Lunch" option in Zurich!
review_data.content: Finally, a great "Grab Lunch" option in Zurich! Pleased to be the first to review! Sandwiches, Salads and Soups...all reasonably priced and healthy! Excellent website! One one complaint...I'd like to see "Schnagg - Iss Frisch" at more locations!!! :)
